claims.object: linking to one of the seven lysine residues or N-terminal methionine of previous ubiquitin

surface_layer.definition: Chains formed when multiple ubiquitin molecules are attached to each other.

deep_layer.mechanism: The C-terminus of another ubiquitin is linked to one of the seven lysine residues or the first methionine on the previously added ubiquitin molecule, creating a chain. This process repeats several times, leading to the addition of several ubiquitins.
